page.title: 13A JOURNALIST VISITS SCHOOL
page.content: On Tues.18thJune Mr Boughey from the TAMWORTH HERALD came to Atherstone North and showed us a film called THE TAMWORTH HERALD STORY and that showed us the stages of making a newspaper. Afterwards we asked him questions like "How many papers does he make?"or"Has he ever been on holiday,seen something and brought it back as a story?"-"No" was the reply,but he's hoping to in future. Then he told everybody about the paper- club called SCOOPER(of which I am a member).He left us with SCOOPER stickers and paper hats ,whch said"I LOVE SCOOPER"The 4th years also watched the film ,because they were doing a project on SERVICES.When everyone had gone out of the hall my teacher called me over and introduced me to Mr Boughy , for I had arranged the visit. NICOLA WARD AGE10
